mapper.insert: insert into qanda.answer(user_id, question_id, answer_content) values (#{user.id}, #{question.id}, #{answerContent});
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, user_id, user_name, question_id, answer_content, t1.gmt_create, upvoteCount FROM ( (SELECT id, user_id, question_id, answer_content, gmt_create FROM answer WHERE answer.question_id = #{questionId} ORDER BY answer.gmt_create DESC LIMIT 1) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT updownvote.answer_id, count(*) upvoteCount FROM updownvote WHERE updownvote.up_or_down = 1 GROUP BY updownvote.answer_id) t2 ON t1.id = t2.answer_id ) LEFT JOIN qanda.user t3 ON t1.user_id = t3.id;
